content: crochet owl amigurumi pattern this crochet pattern includes instructions to make both the larger and mini size of owl amigurumi you ll find step-by-step instructions with lots of photos which makes it easy to follow and beginner friendly materials any #4 worsted-weight yarn can be used for this project you ll need approximately 75-150 yds depending on the size of owl you are making safety eyes i used 12mm for the larger size owl 9 mm for the mini crochet hook - 3 5mm e4 stuffing any fiber-based stuffing yarn needle for weaving in ends and attaching pieces together finished size mini owl approximately 3 5 wide x 3 5 tall larger owl approximately 4 25 wide x 5 tall **you may make and sell any items made from this pattern but please link back to this pattern or loopsandlovecrochet please do not share reproduce or copy this pattern for any purpose please do not re-publish photos as your own ** thank you and happy crocheting loopsandlovecrochet this pattern and others are available for free on my blog at www loopsandlovecrochet com here you are purchasing an ad-free printable pdf version of the pattern follow on instagram www instagram com/loopsandlovecrochet like on facebook www facebook com/loopsandlovecrochet
